name: Razor App: Fake Trimmer Prank
description:
This is one of the most realistic apps of its kind, perfect for jokes and entertaining children simulating a real hair trimmer, clipper, stun gun and motosierra or shaver.

Turn your smartphone into a real hair trimmer / clipper / razor / stun gun / motosierra now!

Features:

- High quality sounds that change when moving the device near someone's head. (Record from the real sound of the device)
- Vibration to imitate a real clipper / razor / stun gun / motosierra.
- Proximity sensor for a more realistic experience.
- Option to change the device as well as add color features to the device

* Especially with the mini games "Flappy Trimmer" gives you more wonderful moments of relaxation.
